HOW TO BUILD

  • Pick a shape from the toolbar.
  • Click anywhere to place shape.
  • Rotate the shape using the ↞ & ↠ arrow keys.
  • Hold mouse down on shape to drag it.
  • Delete Shape by dragging it to trashbin.
  • Press "Clear Canvas" to remove all shapes.

S H A P E D !
